column2: "What? I thought we defeated it!"
"Not bad at all. So Theodore, how's your new body?"
"No problems. Still feels a bit lacking."
"Spendid."
"Still, to not even to match up to a test of your strength, I'm disenchanted with my past self."
"<%me>, long time no see."
"If he's an acquaintance, that means he's in ARKS, right?"
"But that power just now..."
"Beautiful, isn't it? With this, it doesn't matter who it is, they don't stand a chance."
"I can kill and destroy anyone who stands before me as an enemy and offer them up to her."
"You again. It seems that somehow I keep managing to run into you all of the time."
"Normally, this is what's known as fate, but somehow I must infer that it's calculated."
"Really, Xion. Even though everything has already been decided, she still makes such futile attempts."
"Such actions are like her at all, nor do they suit her."
"Is that weak pathetic girl you're with also in ARKS?"
"I don't see any potential in you, but I suppose it leaves some merit for modification."
"How about it? If you so desire, I can give you powers like Theodore here."
"You'll have the potential to protect what you desire without having to lose anything."
"The power to protect...."
"Sudden violent feeling of depravity and despair cause photons to reach a new level. I'm sure you've experienced these."
"If you know what's happened to me and make me such an offer, then you're the worst kind of person!"
"Forgive me, but I'll have to refuse your offer. Zeno would hold a grudge against me if I did!"
"Theodore here is of Claris Claes material, so do as you wish."
"<%me>, until next time."
"What's wrong with him being so rude?"
"What's wrong? The battle scare you into your shell?"
"I really don't know? My body won't stop shaking!"
"You mean Theodore? He's strong, but not that scary..."
"No, the one who was standing behind him."
"It feels like I know him, but I just can't remember. Something about him just..."
"With him in this state, there's no way we're getting more investigating done."
"Let's return, it's enough that we were able to confirm a powerful enemy back here."
"The Darkness Beyond The Haze"
"第4章\u3000霞の先に映る闇"
